messages.subject: Re: Is there a way to add to the links section?
messages.msgSnippet: When I looked in the links section, the add link link is not there. Maybe it has to be set in the admin. controls. I wanted to add a link to the Unschooling
messages.messageBody:
When I looked in the links section, the "add link" link is not
there. Maybe it has to be set in the admin. controls.

I wanted to add a link to the Unschooling Voices Blog Carnival
http://www.foreverparents.com/UnschoolingVoices.html

Thanks so much!

~ Joanne ~
Mom to Jacqueline (7), Shawna (11) & Cimion (13)
Adopted into our hearts October 30, 2003
http://anunschoolinglife.blogspot.com/
http://foreverparents.com

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Is there a way to add to the links section?
messages.msgSnippet: ... From: Joanne  I was wondering if there was a way to add links to the link section in the left sidebar? -=-=-=-= I d hoped someone
messages.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Joanne <billyandjoanne@...>

I was wondering if there was a way to add links to the link section
in
the left sidebar?

-=-=-=-=

I'd hoped someone with a clue would respond. I don't know. But if it's
a managerial thang, you could send me, Ren, Rue, or Deb the link, and
one of us would post it.

I think anyone can though...

~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://liveandlearnconference.org

"The hardest problem for the brain is not learning, but forgetting. No
matter how hard we try, we can't deliberately forget something we have
learned, and that is catastrophic if we learn that we can't learn."
~Frank Smith
